author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-ca/games/lost-records-bloom-and-rage/

Lost Records: Bloom & Rage, the new narrative adventure from the original creators of Life is Strange, is out NOW on PlayStation 5. Tape 2 “Rage”, out today as a free update, completes the thrilling two-part story. 

About the game:  
 
Lost Records: Bloom & Rage is an innovative narrative adventure game set over two timelines, following four high school girls who form lasting friendships over the summer, only to face a mysterious event that will change them forever.  

Reunited, they must piece together what was real, what really happened back then, and what lies festering under the surface of Velvet Cove...   

#ps5 #ps5games #lostrecords #lostrecordsbloomandrage
title: Lost Records: Bloom & Rage - Tape 2 "Rage" Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

Focus Entertainment and Saber Interactive are excited to celebrate the release of the new “Trygon” update for their blockbuster third-person action game Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2. Available on PlayStation 5 right now, today’s update comes with a new PvE mission, a new weapon, two cosmetic DLCs for the Space Wolves and Imperial Fists Space Marine Chapters, a host of quality-of-life improvements and more. 

Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 is available now on PlayStation 5.

#ps5 #ps5games #warhammer40k

title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Trygon Update | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009495

Lushfoil Photography Sim is a first person photography sim. Experience true-to-life recreations of beautiful and diverse locations around the world. Out now on PlayStation 5!

Snap up your copy today: 
PlayStation 5: https://bit.ly/LushfoilPS5

Trek through and explore environments to capture stunning vistas and landscapes with your fully-featured in-game camera. Each environment is filled with objectives to reward players that have a good eye for angles and perspectives, and hidden secrets for those who are patient and observant.

Developed by Matt Newell. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2025

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Lushfoil Photography Sim - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Space Chef is coming to PlayStation 5 in 2025!

Hunt, cook, and deliver cosmic cuisine using ingredients from across the galaxy to become the greatest chef in the Horseshoe Nebula. Explore alien worlds teeming with (edible) life, win the hearts of your customers, and thwart the rise of an evil interstellar burger chain. 

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Space Chef - Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10013373

🔥 CHAINS OF FREEDOM is Out Now! 🔥

Step into a thrilling turn-based tactics game set in a fictional, dystopian Eastern European state. Lead an elite military squad as you navigate perilous missions filled with danger, deceit, and moral dilemmas.

As you delve deeper into a conspiracy threatening your nation, engage in high-stakes tactical combat that demands precision with every move. Arm your team with a variety of weapons and gear, adapt their skills to meet ever-changing challenges, and confront intense missions that push your resolve to its limits. Uncover the truth in a world where the nation’s fate lies in your hands.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Chains of Freedom - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10005976

“Gothic was one of the first immersive open world RPGs. Our job was really to find out what element should stay exactly as they are, what element should be expanded.”

Join the team at Alkimia Interactive and take a look behind the scenes of Gothic 1 Remake, diving deep into the challenges of reviving a cult classic RPG. From preserving the essence of the original to improving story logic, building complex dialogue systems, and simulating a dynamic open world – this video showcases how old-school charm meets modern game design.
 
#ps5 #ps5games #Gothic #ReturnToTheColony

Rated Mature
title: Gothic 1 Remake - Making of #02: Old vs. New | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
In this behind-the-scenes featurette, get an intimate look into the recording process as Jennifer English (Baldur’s Gate III), Ben Starr (FINAL FANTASY XVI), Kirsty Rider (The Sandman), Shala Nyx (The Old Guard), Rich Keeble (Good Omens), and Maxence Cazorla (Ineffable) discuss their roles and share their experiences bringing their characters to life. Hear about the story, the creative process, and the emotional journey behind their performances.

With a cast that also includes Charlie Cox (Marvel Television's Daredevil: Born Again), Andy Serkis (The Lord of the Rings), Devora Wilde (Baldur’s Gate III), Tracy Wiles (Baldur’s Gate III), and a beautifully crafted French-language dub, their voices help tell the story of a world on the brink of total destruction.

The journey begins April 24th on Playstation 5. Pre-order now!

#ps5 #ps5games #clairobscur 

Rated Mature
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Behind the Voices | PS5 Games
